# Pull Request

## Description
Briefly describe the changes introduced by this PR.

## Type of Change
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Refactoring (code improvement without functional change)
- [ ] Documentation update (changes to docs)

## How Has This Been Tested?
- [ ] Manual tests in Claude Code CLI
- [ ] Automated test suite (if applicable)
- [ ] Linting verification (Ruff/ShellCheck)

## Checklist
- [ ] Code follows project standards (CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [ ] Repository root remains clean
- [ ] Documentation updated (if necessary)
- [ ] No sensitive information included in logs/tests
